Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 鬭 from men-fighting 鬥 dòu and phonetic to-hack-zhuo 斲 zhuó and C131 鬥<鬦鬪鬭> A054 斗[鬥] simp 斗. (name- men-fighting (斗)鬥 dòu)

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :

Simplification rule : A054 斗[鬥]

Simplification rule explained :
borrowed-for-sound 斗鬥 斗 (dipper) 鬥 (men fighting)

Variant rule : C131 鬥<鬦鬪鬭>

Variant rule clarification :
鬥 (to argue) TW 鬦 <to argue> 鬪 <to run into> 鬭 <to run into>

鬭字的基本解释

鬭
dòu
同“斗2”。

鬭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dòu］
［《廣韻》都豆切，去候，端。］
亦作“1”。亦作“1”。“斗3”的繁体字。亦作“闘1”。亦作“鬦1”。亦作“鬪1”。亦作“鬭1”。亦作“1”。
(1)战斗；争斗。
(2)比赛；争胜。
(3)古时谓星辰相互撞击。
(4)纷乱。
(5)趁。
(6)面对；相对。
(7)相遇，遇合。
(8)拼合，凑。
(9)茶之精品。
(10)方言。禽鸟之巢。
(11)通“逗”。逗引；挑逗。
(12)通“兜”。招揽。参见“鬥買”。
(13)通“陡”。副词。突然。
(14)姓。春秋时楚有鬭伯比。见《广韵·去候》。

鬭字的康熙字典解释

鬭
Basic explanation of words
鬭
dòu
Same as "Dou 2".
鬭
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dòu］
["Guangyun" cuts all beans, waits, and ends. ]
Also called "1". Also called "1". Traditional characters for "斗3". Also known as "闘1". Also known as "鬦1". Also known as "鬪1". Also known as "鬭1". Also called "1".
(1) Fight; fight.
(2) Competition; competition for victory.
(3) In ancient times, it was said that stars collided with each other.
(4) Chaos.
(5) Take advantage of it.
(6) Facing; relative.
(7) Encounter, meet together.
(8) Put together and make up.
(9) The fine products of tea.
(10) Dialects. Bird's nest.
(11) Through "come". Tease; tease.
(12) Through "pocket". Solicit. See "Buy in a bucket".
(13) Through "steep". adverb. suddenly.
(14) Last name. In the Spring and Autumn Period, there was Bobby Chu. See "Guangyun·Quhou".
